title: The Vesper
description: After being betrayed by someone close to her, Caelyn discovers they are locked outside of Liriter days before her Showing. If she doesn't make it back in time, both her and Wren will die. As they set out to find a way back to Liriter, they uncover secrets none of them are ready for. As Caelyn is led through her Showing, she must make her Choice.Can she save herself and Liriter?
author: Tiffany Roul
